name: Sanguine Barrier
entries: At 3rd level, you learn to use your blood to shield yourself. As a reaction to when you would take damage from a source other than yourself, you can roll your Sanguine Die and take that much damage, then gain temporary hitpoints equal to your roll + your Constitution modifier + your Proficiency Bonus. These hitpoints are lost after 1 minute.
Additionally, when using Second Wind, you can add a roll of your Sanguine Die to the amount you heal.
